LanguageData.RK_Axe.label: Ratkin axe
LanguageData.RK_Axe.description: A bladed implement with a handle typically used for logging. Despite being somewhat smaller than human axes, it is particularly useful for cutting down trees, hewing logs into timber and splitting firewood.
LanguageData.RK_Axe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_Axe.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.label: Ratkin cleaver
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.description: A large knife with a rectangular blade typically used for splitting large, thick pieces of meet. While it helps increase the amount of meat harvested when butchering animals, it is not a particularly good weapon.
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.RK_Cleaver.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.label: Ratkin hoe
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.description: A common agricultural hand tool used for breaking up soil, removing weeds and harvesting root vegetables.
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_Hockey.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Fork.label: Ratkin pitchfork
LanguageData.RK_Fork.description: An agricultural hand tool with a long handle and three tines, good for piling straw.
LanguageData.RK_Fork.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_Fork.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.label: Ratkin Guardener's Sword
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.description: A sword carried by Guardeners, an elite order of Ratkins devoted to tending the Ratkin Kingdom's gardens and defending them from enemies.
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.RK_LongSword.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.label: Ratkin crossbow
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.description: A simple ranged weapon that fires small arrow-like bolts, typically used for hunting.
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_Crossbow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_Crossbow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.label: Ratkin enhanced crossbow
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.description: An improved version of the regular Ratkin crossbow, with increased range and penetration.
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_EnhanceCrossBow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_EnhanceCrossBow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.label: Ratkin automatic crossbow
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.description: A semi-automatic crossbow that can mechanically and rapidly fire multiple bolts from a revolver-style magazine.
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.RK_AutoCrossBow.tools.1.label: arrow
LanguageData.Bolt_RK_AutoCrossBow.label: crossbow bolt
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.label: Ratkin rifle
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.description: A bolt-action rifle patterned after full-size human rifles. It has a longer effective range than a crossbow, and comes equipped with a bayonet for close-quarters combat.
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_Rifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_Rifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.label: Ratkin sniper rifle
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.description: A high-precision long range bolt-action rifle patterned after full-size human sniper rifles, complete with a miniature telescopic sight suitable for Ratkins. Less effective at close ranges.
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_SniperRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_SniperRifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.label: Ratkin flechette rifle
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.description: A variant of the standard Ratkin rifle that fires flechette rounds instead of regular bullets, increasing penetration at the cost of reduced range. It also comes equipped with a bayonet for close-quarters combat.
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteRifle.tools.2.label: flechette
LanguageData.Bullet_RK_FlechetteRifle.label: flechette
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.label: Ratkin flechette sniper rifle
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.description: A variant of the standard Ratkin sniper rifle that fires flechette rounds instead of regular bullets, increasing penetration. It also comes equipped with a bayonet for close-quarters combat.
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.tools.1.label: bayonet

LanguageData.Bullet_RK_FlechetteSniperRifle.label: flechette
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.label: Ratkin prototype pulse rifle
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.description: An experimental energy rifle designed to be used by laboratory-enhanced Ratkin test subjects, this firearm takes inspiration from Ratkin flechette rifles and fires wedge-shaped high-penetration energy projectiles. It comes equipped with a special telescopic lens optimized for near and far targets, as well as a mode selector to switch between rapid fire and precision shots.
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.verbs.0.label: Rapid Fire
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.verbs.0.desc:
Fire a 4-round burst at a mid-range target.

Bonuses:
- Accuracy (short): +50%
- Accuracy (medium): +25%
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.verbs.1.label: Aimed Fire
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.verbs.1.desc:
Fire a 2-round burst at a long-range target.

Bonuses:
- Accuracy (medium): +25%
- Accuracy (long): +50%
LanguageData.RK_PrototypePulseRifle.tools.0.label: stock

LanguageData.RK_BFR.label: BFR 3000
LanguageData.RK_BFR.description: The Big Force Rifle (BFR) 3000 is a heavy sniper rifle patterned after full-sized human anti-materiel rifles, and fires wedge-shaped high-penetration energy projectiles. It comes equipped with a special telescopic lens optimized for near and far targets, as well as a mode selector to switch between armor-piercing (AP) and scattershot (SC) rounds.
LanguageData.RK_BFR.verbs.0.label: AP fire
LanguageData.RK_BFR.verbs.0.desc: Fire an armor-piercing (AP) round at high precision.
LanguageData.RK_BFR.verbs.1.label: SC fire
LanguageData.RK_BFR.verbs.1.desc: Fire an scattershot (SC) round that scatters shrapnel on impact.
LanguageData.RK_BFR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RK_BFR.tools.1.label: barrel

LanguageData.Bullet_BFR_SC.label: wedge bullet (SC)
